00001 <?php
00002 require_once(dirname(__FILE__)."/../support/FileReader.php");
00003 require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/SpriteFile.php');
00004 require_once(dirname(__FILE__)."/S16Frame.php");
00005 class S16File extends SpriteFile
00006 {
00007     private $encoding;
00008     private $frameCount;
00009     private $frames;
00010     private $reader;
00011     
00012     public function S16File(IReader $reader)
00013     {
00014       parent::SpriteFile('S16');
00015         $this->reader = $reader;
00016         $buffer = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00017         if($buffer == 1) {
00018             $this->encoding = "565";
00019         } else if($buffer == 0) {
00020             $this->encoding = "555";
00021         } else {
00022             throw new Exception("File encoding not recognised. (".$buffer.'|'.$this->reader->GetPosition().')');
00023         }
00024         $this->frameCount = $this->reader->ReadInt(2);
00025         for($i=0; $i < $this->frameCount; $i++)
00026         {
00027             $this->AddFrame(new S16Frame($this->reader,$this->encoding));
00028         }
00029     }
00030     public function SetEncoding($encoding) {
00031       $this->EnsureDecompiled();
00032       $this->encoding = $encoding;
00033     }
00034     public function Compile() {
00035       $data = ''; //S16 and C16 are actually the same format....C16 just has RLE. But they're different classes. not very DRY, I know.
00036     $flags = 0; // 0b00 => 555 S16, 0b01 => 565 S16, 0b10 => 555 C16, 0b11 => 565 C16
00037     if($this->encoding == '565') {
00038       $flags = $flags | 1;
00039     }
00040     $data .= pack('V',$flags);
00041     $data .= pack('v',$this->GetFrameCount());
00042     $idata = '';
00043     $offset = 6+(8*$this->GetFrameCount());
00044     foreach($this->GetFrames() as $frame) {
00045       $data .= pack('V',$offset);
00046       $data .= pack('vv',$frame->GetWidth(),$frame->GetHeight());
00047       
00048       $framebin = $frame->Encode();
00049       $offset += strlen($framebin); 
00050       $idata .= $framebin;
00051     }
00052     return $data . $idata;
00053     }
00054 }
00055 ?>
